name: LS EW.Notch
author: Evelyn (ev_ynw)
description:
Kind of imitates the effect of Notchless on lockscreen. If you're on an iPX, SWITCH ON THE 'iPX' OPTION IN THE WIDGET SETTINGS for proper alignment of the notch. Option to use system font (or ported fonts applied via Filza).

Installed to /var/mobile/Library/LockHTML (for LS) and /SBHTML (for HS)

Apply with XenHTML

Need help? Link to tutorials in my pinned tweet

1.0-1: Proper alignment of notch on iPX
